zh._subscribe_desc_: 随时获取本页的最新帖子、Lens 作品和旅行故事更新。
zh._menu_desc_travel_: 探索我旅行中的珍贵记忆
zh._menu_desc_about_: 关于本站、我本人或网站设置
zh._about_page_desc_: 本网站建立于 GitHub Pages（github.io）平台，采用 HTML5、CSS3 和原生 JavaScript 开发。本站为单页面应用（SPA），所有代码由本站作者独立完成。如遇问题，请在 GitHub 上提交 Issues。

en._subscribe_desc_: Stay updated with the latest posts, lens works, and travel stories from this page.
en._menu_desc_home_: Welcome to the homepage of the site !
en._menu_desc_travel_: Explore the cherished memories from my travels
en._menu_desc_about_: About this site, myself, or site settings
en._about_page_desc_: This site is hosted on GitHub Pages (github.io) and developed using HTML5, CSS3, and native JavaScript. It is a Single Page Application (SPA), and all code has been independently developed by the site author. If you encounter any issues, please submit them on GitHub Issues.
